name: Bug Template

title: ''
labels: ''

---

### Bug Template
```markdown
## Bug Description
What's broken?

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Step 1
2. Step 2

## Expected Behavior
What should happen?

## Actual Behavior
What actually happens?

## Research Analysis
AI analysis of the issue

## Proposed Solution
How to fix it

## Testing Plan
How to verify the fix
```
